article.title: Exporting Awards and Recognitions - Sacramento U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Learn about the awards received by clients of the Sacramento U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
May 22, 2013

Infinite Technologiesreceives the Export Achievement Award at the Consular Corps Luncheon sponsored by theNorthern California World Trade Center.


May 17, 2012

McWong Environmental and Energy Group of Sacramento California receives President's "E" Award for Exports

​

March 30, 2012

U.S. Ambassador to Mexico, E. Anthony Wayne, presents Export Achievement Certificate to VARNA Products, of Cameron Park, CA.
article.seometadatatitle: Exporting Awards and Recognitions - Sacramento U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.seometadatadescription: Learn about the awards received by clients of the Sacramento U.S. Export Assistance Center.
